thread.section_title: Hotel Konfidentiel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommended
thread.title_full: Highly recommended - Review of Hotel Konfidentiel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mohammed A
title: Highly recommended
text:
This is a small and very beautiful hotel. It has 6 rooms(1 room per floor) and each one of them is decorated to represent a major french event. The location of the hotel is its biggest advantage. It's 2 minutes away from Musée de Louvre on foot. It's​ also within a walking distance from many major attractions such as Norte Dame Cathedra.
The staff are friendly, smiling and welcoming. Due to issues with booking website, breakfast hasn't been included in my reservation. Despite this confusion, they offered me breakfast daily for free.
